## Get means 

```{r}
vectors <- list(N1, W1, N2, W2, N3, W3, N4, W4, N5, W5, N6, W6, N7, W7, N8, W8, N9,  W9, N10, W10, N11, W11, N12, W12)

means <- sapply(vectors, mean)
```

## Format and save

```{r}
mat<- matrix(means, ncol=2, byrow=T)
df<- as.data.frame(mat)

write.csv(df, "./data/QuadratCoordinates.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
